about.title: About me
about.text:
I’m a 19-year-old developer with a solid foundation in programming since 2021. I have hands-on experience with modern technologies such as React.js, Next.js, Node.js and TypeScript. My journey is marked by the creation of complete, responsive, and optimized web applications, focused on intuitive interfaces and clean code.

Throughout my journey, I’ve developed skills in front-end technologies like Styled Components, HTML, CSS and JavaScript, as well as back-end expertise with PostgreSQL, MongoDB and Prisma ORM. I also have experience with version control tools such as Git, Clean Code practices, and the use of Figma for interface prototyping.

I’m currently seeking opportunities to apply my skills, collaborate with teams, and contribute to challenging projects in the tech industry.
